item.title: The Baby Died. Whose Fault Is It?
item.description: When her son died in utero, a venture capitalist went to extremes to punish her surrogate.

item.title: Join Us for WIRED’s “Uncanny Valley” Live
item.description: Get your tickets to Uncanny Valley’s first live show in San Francisco on September 9, featuring special guest Jack Conte, CEO of Patreon.

item.title: The Concept C Is the All-Electric Sports Car Kick-Starting Audi’s Design Future
item.description: The TT-inspired roadster debuts Audi’s new strategy for “radical simplicity”—and it looks terrific.
